targets.query: host.name:$hostname  kubernetes.container.name:$container AND kubernetes.container.status.phase:running AND cluster:$cluster
host.name:$hostname  AND kubernetes.container.name:$container AND kubernetes.container.status.phase:waiting AND cluster:$cluster
host.name:$hostname  AND kubernetes.container.name:$container AND kubernetes.container.status.phase:terminated AND cluster:$cluster
kubernetes.container.status.phase:running  AND kubernetes.container.name:$container AND cluster:$cluster AND host.name:$hostname
kubernetes.container.status.phase:waiting  AND host.name:$hostname AND kubernetes.container.name:$container AND cluster:$cluster
kubernetes.container.status.phase:terminated  AND host.name:$hostname AND kubernetes.container.name:$container AND cluster:$cluster
kubernetes.pod.name:$container*  AND host.name:$hostname AND kubernetes.pod.status.phase:running AND cluster:$cluster

panels.description: When choosing multiple hosts this metric will show the average FS space
panels.title: Filesystem total space

targets.query: kubernetes.pod.name:$container*  AND host.name:$hostname AND kubernetes.pod.status.phase:pending AND cluster:$cluster
event.module: kubernetes  AND  metricset.name: pod AND host.name:$hostname AND cluster:$cluster AND kubernetes.pod.name:$pod
event.module: kubernetes  AND metricset.name: pod AND host.name:$hostname AND cluster:$cluster AND kubernetes.pod.name:$pod
